message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit your business. We are offering this exceptional item at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, considering its value to you is estimated at $1,500,000. We look forward to discussing the details with you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity. While I recognize the value of the product, $950,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now. I'm willing to pay $750,000 for it. This would still be a substantial profit for you, considering your own valuation.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet us halfway. After careful consideration, we are willing to reconsider our offer. We propose a new price of $875,000 for the product. This still represents a significant profit for us while acknowledging your budget constraints.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $875,000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm prepared to pay $825,000 for the product.  This would be a substantial profit for you and a fair price for me, considering your own valuation.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. We appreciate your efforts to find a mutually beneficial agreement. After reevaluating our position, we are willing to offer the product at a price of $850,000. This proposal allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin while being mindful of your financial considerations.
